SEARCH
Package project332

Class Library

java.lang.Object
project332.Library
public class Library extends Object
Represents a library in the university system. A library manages its own collection of resources, including books, meeting rooms, and electronic resources like PCs and Tablets. Libraries are associated with a specific faculty.
